contents: The announcement page has been updated to integrate patch notes and announcements into the same page.

patchNoteList.title: 2024-11-08 (Temporary Update)
contents: Improved message content for viewing on non-recommended devices.
Profile screen added. (Click the level icon in the upper left to access it)
Changed experience display method (total visit count remains unchanged).
Added guide function for site introduction.
Added buttons for Missions and Announcements.
Added content to the Missions section.
Updated icons and positions of some buttons.
Added message for viewing on non-recommended devices.
Feature added to calculate experience based on site visit count.
Added functionality to charge up to 999 AP.
Added pop-up descriptions when hovering over icons.
